# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We only support the latest released version of VibeGate. Please upgrade to the newest release before reporting issues.

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please report security issues privately so we can investigate and patch before disclosure.

Preferred: open a private GitHub Security Advisory for this repository.

If GitHub advisories are not available, email: **security@vibegate.dev**.

## Response Expectations

We respond on a best-effort basis and aim to acknowledge reports within 72 hours.
